methods.name: public int getX()
methods.content: Get the X position of this pixel in the image

methods.name: public int getY()
methods.content: Get the Y position of this pixel in the image

methods.name: public Image getSourceImage()
methods.content: Get the image that this pixel is part of

methods.name: public Color getColor()
methods.content: Get the color of the pixel in the image

methods.name: public int getRed()
methods.content: Returns the amount of red (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of the pixel.

methods.name: public int getGreen()
methods.content: Returns the amount of green (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of the pixel.

methods.name: public int getBlue()
methods.content: Returns the amount of blue (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of the pixel.

methods.name: public void setRed(int value)
methods.content: Sets the amount of red (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of the pixel. Values below 0 will be ignored and set to 0, and values above 255 with be ignored and set to 255.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"value","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the amount of red (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of the pixel."}]

methods.name: public void setGreen(int value)
methods.content: Sets the amount of green (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of the pixel. Values below 0 will be ignored and set to 0, and values above 255 with be ignored and set to 255.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"value","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the amount of green (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of the pixel.\n"}]

methods.name: public void setBlue(int value)
methods.content: Sets the amount of blue (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of the pixel. Values below 0 will be ignored and set to 0, and values above 255 with be ignored and set to 255.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"value","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the amount of blue (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of the pixel."}]
